ORSHIN Attack Defense Framework

Information disclosure

Description

Information disclosure

Risk Assesment: 8.2

CWE

200

CVE

0783

Attack Surfaces

Controller Implementation (MITRE EMB3D PID-11)

Android

Flouride

Attack Vectors

Information Leak (MITRE EMB3D TID-310)

Defenses

Disable reverse tethering when connection originated by the remote, Check for valid interactions between the PAN profile roles, Disable connections to the local PANU if the remote is not PANU
